meaningMnemonic: When you're driving, you may notice the <radical>flag</radical>s in the <radical>dirt</radical> near the <radical>exit</radical>s. These flags mark the <kanji>ditch</kanji> running along the side of the road. You won't want to try to exit the road here or you'll end up stuck in one.
readingMnemonic: If you do end up veering into a <kanji>ditch</kanji> you'll find yourself yelling, "<reading>Holy</reading> (ほり) crap!" Then you'll go hurtling into the ditch.
